entities.name: harry
entities.description: The protagonist, who is speaking and trying to communicate with someone behind the veil.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Harry's friend, who is whispering a warning to Harry as he approaches the archway.

entities.name: sirius
entities.description: A person whose presence Harry suspects behind the veil. The text does not explicitly confirm Sirius' identity, but it is likely a reference to the character Sirius Black from the Harry Potter series.

relationships.description: Harry has a feeling that there is someone standing right behind the veil on the other side of the archway, and he suspects it might be Sirius.
